param.name: ByAge
param.dialogReference:
Indicator of whether data processing should include age stratification. Requires individual's ages and region specific population of valid age groups.

The following are valid age groups: ["0-4", "5-14", "15-24", "25-34", "35-44", "45-54", "55-64", "65-74", "75-84", "85up"]

param.name: InputIndividualData
param.dialogReference: Layer or table view which contains region (and age, if applicable) of individuals who experienced an event.

param.name: InputIndividualDataFieldsWAge
param.dialogReference:
Fields with the following specifications

  • Region ID: String or integer uniquely identifying each geographic area

  • Age: Age of individual who experienced event

param.name: InputIndividualDataFieldsWOAge
param.dialogReference:
Fields with the following specifications

  • Region ID: String or integer uniquely identifying each geographic area

param.name: InputPopulationData
param.dialogReference: Layer or table view which contains population data aggregated by region and if applicable, age group.

param.name: InputPopulationDataFieldsWAge
param.expression: {Region ID {Population Count} {Age Group};Region ID {Population Count} {Age Group}...}
param.dialogReference:
Fields with the following specifications

  • Region ID: String or integer uniquely identifying each geographic area

  • Population Count: Integer population within region among valid age groups

  • Age Group: String designating age group

The following are valid age groups: ["0-4", "5-14", "15-24", "25-34", "35-44", "45-54", "55-64", "65-74", "75-84", "85up"]

param.name: InputPopulationDataFieldsWOAge
param.dialogReference:
Fields with the following specifications

  • Region ID: String or integer uniquely identifying each geographic area

  • Population Count: Integer population within region among total population

param.name: InputFeature
param.dialogReference: Polygon feature of geographic areas within the input table

param.name: InputFeatureFields
param.dialogReference: String or integer field uniquely identifying each geographic area

param.name: OutputTable
param.dialogReference: Output dataset containing event count and population count aggregated to the region (and age group, if applicable).
